creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in honor of Bill and Libby Clark
description: six trays and cover/lid; each tray and base have four feet; roughly rectangular form when assembled, with diagonal and vertical deep incisions on each side; deep incisions on cover; thick mottled and dripped glazed at interior and exterior: dark brown, milky white, grey, lighter brown, green
markings: on side of bottom tier, on tape: [270000]
medium: Iga ware; Stoneware with ash glaze
title: Assembled Box
